original_text: corny , schmaltzy and predictable , but still manages to be kind of heartwarming , nonetheless . it's the perfect kind of film to see when you don't want to use your brain . at all .
generated_text:
1. "cheesy, over-the-top, and formulaic, yet still somehow endearing and enjoyable. it's the perfect mindless escape."
2. "lame, cliched, and predictable, yet somehow manages to be charming and feel-good. great for a lazy afternoon."
